      @NonNull FxWrapper FxWrapper.setOpacity(double value)
      Sets the virtual opacity of the JavaFX node and notifies the observer (the GreenMirror node, if this FxWrapper is part of a GreenMirror node).
      abstract @NonNull FxWrapper FxWrapper.setPosition(double posX, double posY)
      Sets the x and y coordinates of the virtual origin of the FX node.
      @NonNull FxWrapper FxWrapper.setRotate(double value)
      Sets the virtual rotation of the JavaFX node and notifies the observer (the GreenMirror node, if this FxWrapper is part of a GreenMirror node).
      @NonNull FxWrapper FxWrapper.setRotateBy(double value)
      Adds value to the virtual rotation of the JavaFX node and notifies the observer (the GreenMirror node, if this FxWrapper is part of a GreenMirror node) about it.
      @NonNull FxWrapper FxWrapper.setStyle(@NonNull String value)
      Sets the virtual CSS style of the JavaFX node and notifies the observer (the GreenMirror node, if this FxWrapper is part of a GreenMirror node).
      abstract @NonNull FxWrapper FxWrapper.setX(double value)
      Sets the x coordinate of the virtual origin of the FX node.
      abstract @NonNull FxWrapper FxWrapper.setY(double value)
      Sets the y coordinate of the virtual origin of the FX node.
